sentences.en: A serious fall incapacitated the 68-year-old congressman.
sentences.cn: 一次严重跌伤使这位68岁的国会议员丧失了行动能力。

sentences.en: Even cars with ordinary tyres are not always incapacitated by the spikes.
sentences.cn: 配置普通轮胎的车辆并不总是被大头钉降服.

sentences.en: He is incapacitated and can't work.
sentences.cn: 他受伤致残，失去了工作能力。

sentences.en: His injury incapacitated him for playing basketball.
sentences.cn: 他因受伤而不能打篮球了.

sentences.en: His poor health incapacitated him for work ( from working ).
sentences.cn: 他因健康原因而不能工作.

sentences.en: His poor health incapacitated him for work.
sentences.cn: 他的健康不佳使他不能工作.

sentences.en: I ( the applicant ) am the [ state relationship ] of the mentally incapacitated person.
sentences.cn: 本人 ( 申请人 ) 是该精神上无行为能力的人的 [ 述明与该人的关系 ].

sentences.en: I am a little drunk, but in no way incapacitated.
sentences.cn: 我只是有点醉, 不影响做任何事.

sentences.en: Poor health incapacitated him for work / from working all his life.
sentences.cn: 他身体不好,一辈子不能工作.

sentences.en: Remote Hull Repairers are now available to reactivate incapacitated structures.
sentences.cn: 远程船体修理器现在可用于修理受损的已建筑.

sentences.en: Ruth will be absent today. she is incapacitated by a sore throat.
sentences.cn: 鲁丝今天将缺席, 喉咙痛使他不能出席.

sentences.en: Ruth will be absent today. She is incapacitated by a sore throat.
sentences.cn: Ruth今天将缺席. 因为喉咙痛使她来不了.

sentences.en: She is incapacitated by a sore throat.
sentences.cn: 因为喉咙痛使她来不了.

sentences.en: The player's incapacitated him for participating in the football match.
sentences.cn: 那名运动员的伤势使得他无法参加足球比赛.

sentences.en: The player's injury incapacitated him for participating in the football match.
sentences.cn: 这名队员地伤势使他不能参加这次足球比赛.

words.tran_cn: 不能的；无能力的；不能胜任的
无能力；无资格；不能胜任
使无能力；使不能；使不适于

trans.tran_cn: 使无能力，使不适合( incapacitate的过去式和过去分词 )

trans.tran_en: If something incapacitates you, it weakens you in some way, so that you cannot do certain things
